ValidationRule.description: Require closed lost reason before moving opportunity to closed lost
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT( $Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption ),TEXT(StageName) = "Closed Lost", TEXT(Type) = "Revenue Opportunity", ISCHANGED(StageName), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Renewal")), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "Samsara CSM")), ISBLANK(Closed_Lost_Reason__c), RecordTypeId != '0121a000000VnAB' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please write a closed lost reason before moving to closed lost. Amit thanks you!
